app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/article/10.3390/plants10040711/s1, Figure S1: A comparative view of LC-DAD chromatograms of methanol extracts (1E–6E) of H. officinalis recorded at 320 nm, Figure S2: Dose-response curves in MTT assay after 24, 48 and 72 h treatment of MRC-5 (a–f), SW480 (g–l), MDA-MB 231 (m–r) and HeLa (s–x) cell lines with extracts 1E–6E, Table S1: Component loadings and score coefficients for constituents of Hyssopus officinalis essential oils.
